text: The Wii is a region locked console, so you won't be able to play the European/Australian version(PAL) of the game, without modding your console...There is no legal way to play the game...You can buy it from Europe but you still have to mess with your console...And no, I wouldn't trust eBay...The whole site is a scum, for me at least!

text:
NINTENDO, Y U NO BRING "DISASTER: DAY OF CRISIS" TO AMERICA?!?!

I am still upset about that....I really don't understand it. If they can bring Pokemon and other games like that over, then why not Disaster: DoC? I freaking LOVE this game!! It's SO unfair... :C

But thank you very kindly for uploading the Main Menu OST of Disaster: DoC...I might use it when I draw Ray in one of the natural disasters...but which one is the absolute best..? I like the Firestorm, although I like 'em all..  :O

text:
Judge the game by its quality, NOT by a feature that is or is not in the game!

Also, I don't want to explore this sea...It makes me nauseated and it was plain boring and stupid...

If you want to judge the games based on the exploration alone, then let me talk you about another element...The stealth parts...The Zelda games(except OoT) did not have stealth gameplay...The WW is the first to use it so often...Judge this!
author: Chosen Wisely

text: wind waker had that element of exploratioon, you wanted to sail and discover new areas... just as ocarina of time, n , majoras mask  made you want to explore the enviroment and see whats there to discover...

author: limmik2

text: @limmik2 i dont normally play rpgs, but there are exceptions grandia 2, skies of arcadia and kingdom hearts.... i mostly prefer  games that have a good story,music score eg splinter cell conviction, metal gear solid series, uncharted, mass effect, heavy rain, deus ex, dead space( not on rails version),zone of enders, silent hill, resident evil( not the on rail ones)..... if you were to ask me which was my favourite game, it would be the metal gear solid franchise!!!
author: INGSOC

text: @ILLRICARDO well because i couldnt afford it back then.So now i had the chance to buy it.Maybe for you xeonblade is the game but trust me!It doesnt matter if its the greatest RPG of all times.I'll still wont play it.I enjoy every nintendo game on the wii..Mario,zelda,metroid and exclusived such as the resident evil rail shooters,fragile dreams,disaster.Some of those i played them on  my friernd's console and some of them i will buy in the future.I just dont enjoy playing RPGs as much as you do
author: limmik2

text: @limmik2 forget every other wii game...xenoblade is the game!!!!...ps why buy a console at the end of its life span??? ps xenoblade is the game!!!
author: INGSOC

text: @ILLRICARDO Maybe i will sometime but i just bought a wii recently and there so many games that i want to try first. Xenoblade its just not on the top of my list.But yeah i guess in the future maybe i will give it a chance :)
author: limmik2

text: @limmik2 its true, that i really dont like nintendo since the gamecube, but do love the n64 and snes....but i have to say this, you have to play xenoblade, not many nintendo games, have good story telling, vast worlds, and epic soundtrack, xenoblade is one of the few... and it is a game that should be played, or at least given a chance!!!!...this is comming from a nintendo hater, so the game must be something!!! dude you have to try it!!!
author: INGSOC

text: @ILLRICARDO well if you say xenoblade is the only good single game for the wii then you are not a nintendo fun.i said xenoblade because you said deep story etc...i dont even care about xenonblade.I know that the wii has many shitty games,but it has some fantastic games too.i guess wii isn't your thing
author: limmik2

text: @limmik2 xenoblade is a good game, but we had to wait 5 years for a single good game for the wii!!! and just like disaster day of crisis, xenoblade does not get a worldwide release!!
author: INGSOC

text: @ILLRICARDO Xenoblade Chronicles
author: limmik2

text:
@PurpleDolphiN42 wii is a disaster, since a majority of the games are meant for a  younger target audience, they could have atleast put in some taught as to, how  easy the younger target audience will akward motion controls!!! 
as for games for the mature target audience, its pathetic, there is nothing worth playing only repetitive hack and slash games!!!!
author: INGSOC

text: @PurpleDolphiN42 just making a reference.. Nintendo keep ideas fresh!!! WOW. thats a load of bull..how is mario kart, smash brothers, new super mario brothers keeping things freah..... when i look at titles like gears of war, splinter cell, metal gear solid, uncharted, god of war, ico, shadow of the collosus, Valkyria Chronicles, mass effect... i see innovation, immersive worlds and a unique experience,  name me one game on the wii which has a deep storyline, huge immersive worlds??
author: INGSOC

text: @PurpleDolphiN42  best selling console, doesnt mean that it is the best games machine..... ps just cause justin bieber sell a shit load of records, doesnt mean he is the best musician!!!
author: INGSOC

text: @PurpleDolphiN42 well so tell me, when was the last time nintendo made a good game??? since the n64... all the wii is, and will always be nothing but a gimmick.... nintendo should just do what sega does, just develop games... but i am curious to know what games you think  are so amazing!!!  may be mario kart, smash brothers, which is the same game, almost same levels and same music since the n64 days, just has better graphics???
author: INGSOC

text: @PurpleDolphiN42 NINTENDO suffered a  net loss of $329 million for the three months ended June 30th, and cutting its full year profit forecast by 82% to $258 million, shares at one point dropped by over 20%... and you call me a moron, and say its the best selling console world wide!!!!  verious heads of the company took 20% pay cuts  as well cause of the wii's lacluster performance..... moron!!! ps you have just been lawyered!!!! suck on that bitch
